snippet: John Krachenfels, the manager of business development at the Oracle Corporation, was cruising through Silicon Valley not long ago. He was going a "few miles over the speed limit," he acknowledged, and glancing at his electronic mail at the same ti...
lead_paragraph: John Krachenfels, the manager of business development at the Oracle Corporation, was cruising through Silicon Valley not long ago. He was going a "few miles over the speed limit," he acknowledged, and glancing at his electronic mail at the same time, when a California Highway Patrol officer pulled him over. Spotting the open laptop connected to a cellular modem in the front passenger seat, the officer asked, "Sir, what is the maximum safe speed for computing?"
